title: Patient Safety Behavior Reinforcement Education Through Informal Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of patient rights concepts
context.additional_context: Education on fostering patient safety culture through informal discussion-based learning for learners preparing to enter the medical field

learning_goals: Learners can explain the importance of reporting systems in patient safety incidents and analyze three or more barriers to reporting.
Learners can recognize authority gradient issues in virtual clinical scenarios and propose communication strategies to mitigate them.
Learners can develop specific action plans based on attitudes related to patient safety and improve them at least twice through peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
